title: Taiwan opens terrifying walkway
text: ‘The response I got was quite rude’ 0:00 AM Robyn Ironside National Travel Writer WHAT should have been a joyful time for a young Aussie couple was soured by a harsh lesson about the need to take out travel insurance. Airport greets arriving flyers with porn 19:14 PM Staff Writers INSTEAD of flight information, the TVs at one airport’s baggage claim left very little to the imagination. These are the worst - and best - airports in the world 18:07 PM Leah McLennan SOME of these airports are shocking in their lack of facilities, while others are remarkable in what they offer. And Adelaide’s airport is right up high on one of the lists. ‘How I travel on $30 a day’ 17:19 PM Tyson Mayr TYSON Mayr has spent a whole year travelling the world with a budget of just $10,000. So how does he do it? ‘Australia’s worst airline’ in big overhaul 17:18 PM Leah McLennan TIGERAIR has been called Australia’s worst airline, but now it’s promising a lot of changes. It claims its cheap ticket prices will remain too. Mum didn’t know son died 25 years ago 17:17 PM Rohan Smith CAROL’S son died when his plane fell from the sky. She didn’t grieve. She didn’t visit the crash site. But that’s not because she didn’t love him. Taiwan opens terrifying walkway 17:16 PM Staff Writers THIS glass-bottomed bridge suspended far above a spectacular valley is not for the faint of heart. These are the worst airports in the world 16:16 PM Leah McLennan IF YOU can avoid it, try not to end up in these places for extended amounts of time. The lack of facilities in these airports will shock you.
